movies.title: Chansons interdites
movies.plot: A Polish musician tells a young soldier about his wartime activity - setting up a street orchestra and taking part in the anti-Nazi resistance movement.
movies.simplePlot: A Polish musician tells a young soldier about his wartime activity - setting up a street orchestra and taking part in the anti-Nazi resistance movement.

biography.placeOfBirth: Kosarzyska, Galicia, Austria-Hungary [now Kosarzyska, Piwniczna-Zdrój, Malopolskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Danuta Szaflarska was born on February 6, 1915 in Kosarzyska, Galicia, Austria-Hungary as Zofia Danuta Szaflarska. She was an actress, known for Il est temps de mourir (2007), Aftermath (2012) and Tydzien z zycia mezczyzny (1999). She was married to Jan Ekier and Janusz Kilanski. She died on February 19, 2017 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Danuta Szaflarska

biography.placeOfBirth: Szczypiorno, Poland, Russian Empire [now Szczypiorno, Kalisz, Wielkopolskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Janina Ordezanka was born on January 9, 1889 in Szczypiorno, Poland, Russian Empire [now Szczypiorno, Kalisz, Wielkopolskie, Poland]. She was an actress, known for Chansons interdites (1947), Aktorzy prowincjonalni (1979) and La troisième partie de la nuit (1971). She died on July 24, 1981 in Kraków, Malopolskie, Poland.
biography.name: Janina Ordezanka

biography.bio: Jerzy Duszynski was born on May 15, 1917 in Moscow, Russia. He was an actor, known for Smierc prezydenta (1977), Chansons interdites (1947) and Awantura o Basie (1959). He was married to Hanka Bielicka. He died on July 23, 1978 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Jerzy Duszynski

biography.placeOfBirth: Chmelenz, Pomerania, Germany [now Chmieleniec, Pomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Jan Swiderski was born on January 14, 1916 in Chmelenz, Pomerania, Germany. He was an actor, known for Spirala (1978), Kariera (1955) and Chansons interdites (1947). He died on October 18, 1988 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Jan Swiderski

biography.bio: Jan Kurnakowicz was born on January 27, 1901 in Vilna, Russian Empire. He was an actor, known for La ville indomptée (1950), Zemsta (1957) and Love or a Kingdom (1936). He was married to Anna Tyminska. He died on October 4, 1968 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Jan Kurnakowicz

biography.placeOfBirth: Warsaw, Poland, Russian Empire [now Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland]
biography.bio: Stanislaw Lapinski was born on September 25, 1895 in Warsaw, Poland, Russian Empire. He was an actor, known for Chansons interdites (1947), Dzis w nocy umrze miasto (1961) and Le chanteur de Varsovie (1934). He died on January 26, 1972 in Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland.
biography.name: Stanislaw Lapinski

biography.placeOfBirth: Morshansk, Tambov Governorate, RSFSR [now Tambov Oblast, Russia]
biography.bio: Zofia Jamry was born on February 27, 1918 in Morshansk, Tambov Governorate, RSFSR. She was an actress, known for Chansons interdites (1947), Samson (1961) and Pamietnik pani Hanki (1963). She died on December 29, 2006 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Zofia Jamry

biography.placeOfBirth: Plonsk, Poland, Russian Empire [now Plonsk, Mazowieckie, Poland]
biography.bio: Konstanty Pagowski was born on October 19, 1890 in Plonsk, Poland, Russian Empire. He was an actor, known for Chansons interdites (1947), La maison solitaire (1949) and Spotkania w mroku (1960). He died on April 25, 1967 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Konstanty Pagowski

biography.placeOfBirth: Lomza, Poland, Russian Empire [now Lomza, Podlaskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Józef Maliszewski was born on June 29, 1892 in Lomza, Poland, Russian Empire. He was an actor, known for Coeurs ardents (1932), Chansons interdites (1947) and Grzeszna milosc (1929). He died on March 9, 1972 in Zakopane, Malopolskie, Poland.
biography.name: Józef Maliszewski

biography.placeOfBirth: Kononovka, Poltava Governorate, Russian Empire [now Kononivka, Cherkasy Oblast, Ukraine]
biography.bio: Hanka Bielicka was born on November 9, 1915 in Kononovka, Poltava Governorate, Russian Empire as Anna Weronika Bielicka. She was an actress, known for Colonel Wolodyjowski (1969), Pierwsze dni (1952) and Malzenstwo z rozsadku (1967). She was married to Jerzy Duszynski. She died on March 9, 2006 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Hanka Bielicka

biography.placeOfBirth: Warsaw, Poland, Russian Empire [now Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland]
biography.bio: Maria Bielicka was born on December 19, 1909 in Warsaw, Poland, Russian Empire [now Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland]. She was an actress, known for Chansons interdites (1947). She died on April 22, 1989 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Maria Bielicka

biography.placeOfBirth: Warsaw, Poland, Russian Empire [now Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland]
biography.bio: Janina Draczewska was born on November 29, 1891 in Warsaw, Poland, Russian Empire [now Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland] as Janina Drac. She was an actress, known for Chansons interdites (1947), First Start (1951) and Adventure in Marienstadt (1954). She died on January 16, 1962 in Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland.
biography.name: Janina Draczewska

biography.bio: Alina Janowska was born on April 16, 1923 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Niezawodny system (2008), Calls Controlled (1991) and Wojna domowa (1965).
biography.name: Alina Janowska

biography.placeOfBirth: Warsaw, Poland, Russian Empire [now Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland]
biography.bio: Helena Puchniewska was born on July 12, 1891 in Warsaw, Poland, Russian Empire [now Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland]. She was an actress, known for Chansons interdites (1947), Une chaumière et un coeur (1949) and First Start (1951). She died on August 8, 1971 in Pelkinie, Podkarpackie, Poland.
biography.name: Helena Puchniewska

biography.bio: Stanislawa Piasecka was born on January 12, 1918 in Odessa, Ukraine. She was an actress, known for Chansons interdites (1947). She died on October 31, 1976 in Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland.
biography.name: Stanislawa Piasecka
